FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Class DirectGraphRenderer

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

A high-performance graph renderer that draws directly to a DrawingContext, bypassing the Avalonia visual tree for nodes and edges. This is optimized for large graphs (500+ nodes) where per-element Controls are too slow.

Uses GraphRenderModel for all geometry calculations to ensure 100% visual parity with the normal VisualTree renderer.

public class DirectGraphRenderer : Control, INotifyPropertyChanged, IDataContextProvider, ILogical, IThemeVariantHost, IResourceHost, IResourceNode, IStyleHost, ISetLogicalParent, ISetInheritanceParent, ISupportInitialize, IStyleable, INamed, IInputElement, IDataTemplateHost, ISetterValue

Remarks

DirectGraphRenderer supports custom node rendering via the IDirectNodeRenderer interface. When a node's renderer implements IDirectNodeRenderer, it delegates drawing to that implementation.

Edge endpoint handles are rendered when ShowEdgeEndpointHandles is true and an edge is selected, allowing reconnection/disconnection.

Constructors

DirectGraphRenderer(FlowCanvasSettings)

Creates a new DirectGraphRenderer with the specified settings.

public DirectGraphRenderer(FlowCanvasSettings settings)

Parameters

settings FlowCanvasSettings

Canvas settings for rendering configuration.

DirectGraphRenderer(FlowCanvasSettings, NodeRendererRegistry?)

Creates a new DirectGraphRenderer with the specified settings and node renderer registry.

public DirectGraphRenderer(FlowCanvasSettings settings, NodeRendererRegistry? nodeRenderers)

Parameters

settings FlowCanvasSettings

Canvas settings for rendering configuration.

nodeRenderers NodeRendererRegistry

Optional registry of custom node renderers.

public bool IsEditing { get; }

Property Value

Model

Gets the render model used for geometry calculations. This model is shared with other renderers to ensure visual parity.

public GraphRenderModel Model { get; }

Property Value

Gets or sets the node renderer registry for custom node types.

public NodeRendererRegistry? NodeRenderers { get; set; }

Property Value

Parameters

edgeId string

ID of the edge, or null to clear.
